item.title: the flying proletarian / Mayakovsky
item.description: via the V. V. Mayakovsky bio in the Encyclopedia of Soviet Authors: In 1925 Mayakovsky also made one of his few forays into the sphere of utopian science fiction with his poem Letaiushchi Proletarii ("The Flying Proletarian"). As described by Victor Tarras in his biography of Mayakovsky, The Flying Proletarian was: ...set in the year 2125 and features a giant air battle, with death rays and such, between the Soviet proletarian and the American bourgeois air forces.
